Novel Baswedan Cerita Kenapa Matanya di Video Seperti Tak Terluka
05 Nov 2019, 10:05 by M Rosseno Aji, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Penyidik senior Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi Novel Baswedan menceritakan alasan kenapa matanya yang ada di dalam video viral terlihat seperti baik-baik saja.
Ia mengatakan video itu diambil sebelum menjalani operasi mata osteo odonto keratoprosthesis--metode operasi bagi pasien dengan cidera kornea. Novel menjalani operasi di Singapore National Eye Centre pada 17 Agustus 2017. Operasi dilakukan untuk membersihkan mata dari katarak dan menyedot cairan glukoma di bola mata yang terluka. Kemudian, dilanjutkan dengan mencabut dan meleburkan satu gigi, serta memotong dan mencabut gusi yang digunakan untuk melapisi mata.
Novel menturkan bila orang melihat kondisi matanya sebelum operasi, pasti akan menganggap matanya baik-baik saja, tidak berwarna merah seperti sekarang dan bening seperti kelereng. "Tapi sebenarnya selnya justru sudah banyak yang mati dan fungsi melihatnya sangat kurang," kata dia ketika dihubungi Selasa, 5 November 2019.
Dalam operasi itu, dokter membuat retina artifisial dari gigi yang dibentuk menjadi ring dan membuat pelapisnya dengan lapisan tipis yang ada di kulit gigi. Artifisial tersebut kemudian ditanam ke dalam pipi untuk menjadi retina baru.
Menurut Novel, setiap perawatan yang dia jalani selalu dilaporkan ke pimpinan KPK. Ia mengatakan ada pula pegawai KPK lainnya yang selalu menemaninya selama perawatan dan mengetahui kondisi sebenarnya.
Sebelumnya beredar sebuah video Novel sedang duduk sambil didorong di kursi roda. Rekaman merupakan liputan Net TV. Dari rekaman itu terlihat Novel menjawab semua pertanyaan yang dilontarkan si wartawan mengenai kondisi kesehatan, khususnya mata. "Setiap hari, kata dokter menunggu proses karena harus bertahap ya," jawab Novel.
Pengunggah video itu menyertakan keterangan tertulis yang tak sesuai fakta. "Mata Novel Baswedan saat baru ditayangin di NET TV 18 april 2017..!?dia kaget dg tiba2 kemunculan wartawan NET, liat matanya dan pipi mulus pdhl baru kasus penyiraman," tulis si empunya akun akun itu.
Dari video itu, sejumlah pemilik akun media sosial di Twitter lantas menuduh adanya rekayasa dalam penyiraman air keras terhadap Novel. Akun-akun itu mencuit dengan narasi soal adanya skenario di kasus Novel Baswedan. "Mungkin dulu Novel Baswedan cuma kena tetes air keras, bukan disiram air keras macam vokalisnya saint loco yang mukanya melepuh semua," tulis pemilik akun @Agung***.

Novel Baswedan Story Why His Eyes on the Video Like Not Injured
05 Nov 2019, 10:05 by M Rosseno Aji, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Senior investigator at the Corruption Eradication Commission Baswedan tells the reason why his eyes in the viral video look like they are doing well.
He said the video was taken before undergoing osteo odonto keratoprosthesis eye surgery - a method of surgery for patients with corneal injuries. Novel underwent surgery at the Singapore National Eye Center on August 17, 2017. The operation was carried out to clean the eyes of cataracts and suck glaucous fluid in the injured eyeball. Then, followed by pulling and melting one tooth, and cutting and pulling the gums that are used to coat the eyes.
Novel menturur if people see the condition of his eyes before the operation, will surely consider his eyes fine, not red like now and clear as marbles. "But actually many cells have actually died and the function of seeing is very lacking," he said when contacted Tuesday, November 5, 2019.
In the operation, the doctor makes an artificial retina from the teeth formed into a ring and makes the coating with a thin layer that is on the skin of the teeth. The artificial is then implanted into the cheek to become a new retina.
According to Novel, every treatment he underwent was always reported to the leadership of the KPK. He said there were also other KPK employees who always accompanied him during treatment and knew his true condition.
Previously circulated a Novel video was sitting while being pushed in a wheelchair. The recording is coverage of Net TV. From the tape, Novel can be seen answering all the questions asked by the journalist about health conditions, especially the eyes. "Every day, said the doctor is waiting for the process because it must be gradual, yes," Novel replied.
The video uploader included a written statement that did not match the facts. "Novel Baswedan's eyes when they were just aired on NET TV on April 18, 2017 ...!? He was shocked by the sudden appearance of NET reporters, seeing his eyes and cheeks smooth on the new watering case," wrote the owner of the account.
From the video, a number of social media account owners on Twitter then accused the engineered watering of the novel. The accounts tweeted with narration about the scenario in the Baswedan Novel case. "Maybe Baswedan's novel was only hit by a drop of hard water, not doused with hard water like the saint loco vocalist whose face was blistered all," wrote the account holder @Agung ***.
